Subskills.name: Bigger Web
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of retiarius net.

Subskills.name: Well Knitted Net
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by retiarius net.

Subskills.name: Rocket Boosted Net
Subskills.description: Throw retiarius net towards the nearest monsters with increased speed dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Gladiators Resilience
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using retiarius net.

Subskills.name: Throwing Technique
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of retiarius net.

Subskills.name: Bouncing Net
Subskills.description: Chance to bounce towards a nearby monster when landing.

Subskills.name: Target for Destruction
Subskills.description: Chance to rain down a spike ball on hit dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Sharp String Net
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Arena Dominator
Subskills.description: Pull nearby monsters towards you rooting them in place. Retiarius net now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Multinet Throw
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional retiarius net.

Subskills.name: Devastating Net
Subskills.description: Increases damage to targets inflicted with serrated chains.

Subskills.name: Elastic Strings
Subskills.description: Chance to pull nearby monsters towards the point of impact when landing.

Subskills.name: Metal Net
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius and damage slowing monsters on hit instead of rooting them.

Subskills.name: Ricocheting Net
Subskills.description: Retiarius net bounces between multiple monsters increasing its damage dealt with every bounce.
